snippet.title: Else Heart.Break() Release Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the release trailer for Else Heart.Break() – out now on Steam, Humble and GOG:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/400110
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/elseheart_break_storefront
http://www.gog.com/game/else_heartbreak

The game is a reimagination of the adventure game genre: a fantastic story set in a fully dynamic and interactive world. Instead of rigid puzzles you will learn (with the help from other characters in the game) how the reality of the game can be changed through programming and how any problem can be solved in whatever way you find suitable.

http://www.elseheartbreak.com

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/400110
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/elseheart_break_storefront
